meanings.definition: Exceeding others in quality or degree.
meanings.sent1: The surpassing beauty of the sunset took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork is surpassing, showcasing her talent and creativity.
meanings.sent3: The cat's surpassing ability to nap for hours amazed everyone in the house.
meanings.sent4: The surpassing speed of the cheetah made it seem like a blur in the savannah.
meanings.sent5: The surpassing aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the entire kitchen.

meanings.definition: To go beyond in amount, extent, or degree.
meanings.sent1: I hope to surpass my personal record in the upcoming race.
meanings.sent2: She worked hard to surpass the expectations set by her boss.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to surpass the height of the tree but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: His determination to surpass all obstacles was like a raging river.
meanings.sent5: The student's effort to surpass his classmates was evident in his consistent hard work.
